name: AVCaptureAudioChannel
desc: An object that monitors average and peak power levels for an audio channel in a capture connection.

items.name: var averagePowerLevel: Float
items.desc: The instantaneous average power level, in dB.

items.name: var peakHoldLevel: Float
items.desc: The peak hold power level, in dB.

items.name: var volume: Float
items.desc: The current volume (gain) of the channel.

items.name: var isEnabled: Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether the channel is currently enabled for data capture.
